attributes.action: KEEP THE BAN ON HUNTING AND MAKE IT IRREVERSIBLE!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do not let the Ban on Hunting be repealed by the landowners, upper classes, sons of pop singers, and the rest of the useless band of humans who thinking chasing and killing an animal is a so called 'sport'.  Time to move into the 21st century. Ban it forever!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
